lead_paragraph: ABRAMS--Nancy A.,70, of St. Petersburg, FL, died Tuesday, July 12, 2016, at St. Anthony's Hospital. A former NYC resident, Nancy retired in 2008 from the Manhattan District Attorney's office. Nancy was predeceased by her parents, Lea and Harry Abrams of Worcester, MA, and her brother, Laurence, of St. Petersburg. Celebrate her memory by planting trees in Israel or making a donation to the charity of your choice. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  ABRAMS, NANCY A.
